name: Neon Flight (HZanchet, es-arvind13, JhonGomez)
description:
Description

Face the army of the reds alone in your modified ship, your doom is inevitable, but you’ll fight until the end!

--------------------------------------------------------

Computer Controls

  • W, S, A, D - Move.
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot.

Xbox Controller:

  • Left Analog - Move
  • A - Shoot

--------------------------------------------------------

Development Team

  • Jhon Gomez: Project Manager and Level Designer 

(https://jhongomez.itch.io)

  • Arvind Chettiar: Programmer, UI Designer and Player Controller

(https://es-arvind13.itch.io)

  • Henrique Zanchet: 3D Artist, SFX, UI Designer and Webpage Designer 

(https://hzanchet.itch.io)
